title: To Spot a Mockingbird
description: A birdwatching tool, allowing users to log their bird sightings and identify birds by species.

title: Thirsty Thistles
description: Allows gardeners to create a watering schedule based on plant type, and to check off which plants have been watered.

title: Market Analysis App
description: Provides a platform for users to rate products, and displays a graph of the results.
